title: Corporate Climate Plans Mostly Fall Short, Report Says
sub_head: Advocacy groups say patchy data and a lack of transparency undermine companiesâ€™ efforts
body:
CVS Health Corp. set a target last year to almost halve the carbon emissions from the goods and services it buys by 2030 as part of its new climate-change plan.
Due in part to the way the pharmacy giant set the target, it beat that goal even before making it public last October, according to its emissions disclosures.
